title: Fund Nepal - Crowd funding Platform
description: It's an crowdfunding platform where people can raise a fundraiser campaign as well donate to various fundraiser. Ensuring good interaction between people with a best supporting experience.

features.title: Fundraiser Creation
features.description: Users can start a fundraiser with images, descriptions, and bank details.

features.title: Admin Approval System
features.description: Fundraisers require admin verification before going live.

challenges.solution: Used documentation of related gateways to implement payment system.

contributions: Implemented the backend API and authentication
lessonsLearned: Managing state in large React applications
Adding payment gateways in web applications

title: Shayata - Expert Home Fixes
description: Shayata is a platform that connects users with expert home repair professionals. Users can easily request home fixes, and the Shayata team delivers the services. The platform offers smooth user interaction and an easy-to-use admin dashboard.

features.title: Service Request Form
features.description: Users can fill out a detailed form to request various home repair services.

features.title: Service Categories
features.description: The platform offers a wide range of service categories like plumbing, electrical, and home cleaning.

features.title: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin dashboard to manage service requests, assign tasks, and view analytics.

features.title: User Dashboard
features.description: Users have access to track service status and manage their requests.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Interactive charts and graphs to monitor service requests, deliveries, and other metrics.

challenges.solution: Implemented an effective task assignment system for admins and streamlined scheduling.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring smooth user experience without payment integration.
challenges.solution: Created an easy-to-navigate interface and focused on offline payment methods.

contributions: Implemented backend APIs for service requests and task management
Created interactive charts and analytics for the admin dashboard
lessonsLearned: Building scalable dashboards for users and admins
Handling data management in real-time applications
Ensuring seamless user experience without payment integration
Optimizing large datasets for fast load times

title: RentNest - Room Rental Platform
description: RentNest is a platform that simplifies the process of finding and listing rental rooms. It connects property owners with tenants through a secure, user-friendly interface, offering efficient listing management, location-based search, and transparent communication.

features.title: Multi-Step Listing Creation
features.description: Owners can easily create room listings through a guided multi-step form including basic info, specifications, pricing, location, and image uploads.

features.title: Real-Time Listing Preview
features.description: Users can review their listings with live previews before publishing, ensuring accurate and well-presented content.

features.title: Search and Filter System
features.description: Tenants can search rooms by city, district, or price range, and apply filters for room type and availability.

features.title: Dashboard Management
features.description: Separate dashboards for owners and admins to manage listings, track activity, and review reports.

challenges.challenge: Managing state across multiple steps of the listing form.
challenges.solution: Used Zustand with persistence middleware to handle multi-step form data efficiently and prevent data loss on reload.

challenges.challenge: Optimizing dashboard and listing pages for performance.
challenges.solution: Used lazy loading for images and efficient data fetching patterns to ensure fast page load times.

contributions: Developed responsive frontend using Next.js and Tailwind CSS
Designed and implemented custom backend API using NestJS
Built secure authentication system with NestJS passport
Designed admin and owner dashboards for efficient management
lessonsLearned: Managing complex form state across multiple steps
Design and implement custom backend with NestJS
Designing reusable and optimized dashboard layouts
Improving UX for both property owners and renters
